ValidationRule.description: The quantity entered must be at least 25 for Named User Meter Type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (TEXT(Meter_Type__c) ="Named Users"), License_Product__c = TRUE, SBQQ__Quantity__c<25, $Profile.Name<>"Standard User - Sales Operations", $User.Id <> "00550000002q64G" /*Jennifer Richard*/, $Profile.Name<>"System Administrator")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The quantity entered must be at least 25 for Named User Meter Type.
